name: Fire Means War
description:
Play Battleship with your friends via Bluetooth or WiFi. The current pirate-oriented theme, epic music and your will to win will take "Fire Means War" to a whole new level of playing Battleship!
So call your friends, tell them to download this application and let the matches begin!

**Singleplayer mode
Play on three different difficulties and try to win against your smartphone

**Multiplayer mode
Connect your smartphone with your friends via Bluetooth or Wifi and start battling each other

**Ship Layout
Choose the preferred layout for your ships

**Music and Sound
Listen to epic music while playing


Music by Matthew Pablo | http://www.matthewpablo.com
